My Public Brain

All Pages

Logseq inline commands

page-type

Topic

Start most commands with a leading /

Logseq Commands as of 2021-05-26 Wednesday

Command Action
/LATER Mark block as a task to be finished later
/NOW Mark block as a task currently in-process
/TODO Mark block as a task
/DOING Mark block as a task currently in-process
/DONE Mark block as a completed task
/A Mark block as highest priority
/B Mark block as medium priority
/C Mark block as low priority
/Deadline Schedule a due date / time for the current block
/Scheduled Schedule a start date / time for the current block
/Query Construct a Logseq data query from the current block
/Draw Open a whiteboard for drawing(!) in the current block
/WAITING Mark block as a task waiting on some condition
/CANCELED Mark block as a canceled task
/Tomorrow Insert tomorrow’s date at point
/Yesterday Insert yesterday’s date at point
/Today Insert the current date at point
/Current Insert the current time at point
/Date Picker Interactively select a date to insert at point
/Page Reference Inserts [[]] fragment at point
/Page Embed Inserts {{embed [[]]}} at point
/Block Embed Inserts {{embed (())}} at point
/Block Reference Inserts (()) at point
/Link Interactively inserts a browser link at point
/Upload ... Select an asset to upload and display at point
/Template Insert a template at point
/Embed YouTube Video Insert YouTube player for video with a given ID at point
/Embed Vimeo Video Insert Vimeo player for video with a given ID at point
/Html Inline Insert raw HTML at point

Notes written in Logseq and published with Eleventy.
